reviewText:
I like this movie.  The actors are great, and the sights are great!  Not perfect but very entertaining.

This movie is very dramatic, so if you don't like drama, don't waste your time.  I hear the book is good too, maybe I will read it someday!
if you read the book, like the circus, enjoy a writer who has done there homework, this is the movie for you.  I have watched numerous times.
